question: Chris was a pen pal with 10 people. He stopped being penpals with 1 of them. They each send 4 letters a week that are 6 pages long. He responds in kind. He can write a page every 10 minutes. How many hours does he spend writing a week?
answer:
Chris is penpals with 10-1=<<10-1=9>>9 people
Thus he gets 9*4=<<9*4=36>>36 letters a week
So he writes 36*6=<<36*6=216>>216 pages a week
So he writes for 216*10=<<216*10=2160>>2160 minutes a week
So he writes 2160/60=<<2160/60=36>>36 hours a week
#### 36
